job.title: Data Engineer/Application Developer , Supply Chain Systems
job.description: brstrongSummarybrstrong brImagine what you could do here At Apple outstanding ideas have a way of becoming great products services and customer experiences very quickly Bring passion and dedication to your job and theres no telling what you could accomplishbrbrbrAs an Application engineer you will be part of the team that builds topnotch business applications for Worlds leader in Supply Chain Apple Inc brbrbrAs a part of ISampT SCI team you will play a pivot role in building endtoend bestinclass software solutions for Apple Supply Chain needs varying from Supply and demand Planning Product distribution and so on You will partner with various stakeholders to define and implement solutions that optimize our internal business processesbrbr brstrongKey Qualificationsbrstrong br8 years of meaningful experience in enterprise level application development using sophisticated Oracle database technologiesbrbrbr5 years of programming experience Python Data Analytics platformsPandas Data frames sqlalchemy numpy etcbrbrbrHands on Experience with large volume databases for both OLTP and OLAP environmentbrbrbrExperience in distributed data processing systemsbrbrbrIn depth Python programming experience with building high scale enterprise application specialized in queuesmultiprocessingmultithreadingbrbrbrExperience in Application database designarchitecture Oraclenosqlgraph databasesbrbrbrExperience with REDIS data store any inmemory data structure platformsbrbrbrExperience in spark kafka big data technologiesbrbrbrExperience in building Django  Flask  wildfly Java based App server brbrbrGood experience in consuming or exposing web services ie SOAP RESTbrbrbrThorough knowledge on UNIXLinux platforms Scripting experience with Shell JSON Advanced SQLs Oracle PLSQLsbrbrbrExperience in developing business applications for Supply Chain domainbrbrbrValidated ability in supporting the expansion and maintenance of various Oracle database based solutionsbrbrbrAbility to reliably handle and collaborate with contractorsbrbrbrExperience in full system implementation lifecycles using Agile  WaterfallbrbrbrAbility to multitask work independently with minimal supervisionbrbrbrExcellent verbal and written communication skillsbrbrbrComfortable working in a multidiscipline geographically dispersed teambrbr brstrongDescriptionbrstrong brYou will Interface with application owners developers  QA project managers Support teams and end users Lead proofofconcept and pilot implementations to demonstrate new ideas or illustrate the use of new technologies and how to apply it into our systemsbrbrbrStrive for top quality results and continuously look for ways to improve and enhance system reliability performance and security brbrbrHe or she must be able to perform regular design and code reviews and participate in debugging and coding to resolve issues Provide technical guidance and mentoring to a small team of software engineers Develop critical system components as well as take bottom line for teams timely work youre doing quality and performancebrbrbrDemonstrates understanding of information management data modeling system integration development methodologies including unit testing and web technologiesbrbrbrParticipate in architectural design meetings for datasystem integration projectsbrbrbrTeam lead experience is a plus Occasionally will need to handle Application Production warranty supportbrbrbrWorking with highly bred to bear outsourcing modelbrbr brstrongEducation amp Experiencebrstrong brBS  MS in Computer Science or equivalent 7 years of proven experiencebrbr brRole Number 200241072brbr
